title: Chelsea Flea Market
location: West 25th Street, between Sixth & Broadway, New York, NY
short_description: With 40 years under its belt, Chelsea Flea Market is one of the go to places for NYC locals and visitors to find the perfect little something they couldn’t find anywhere else.
more_content:
For 40 years, the Chelsea Flea Market has been the go to place in downtown Manhattan for locals and visitors to find unique vendors carrying collectibles, decorative arts, antiques, vintage clothing and whatever else their heart could possibly desire.

With only $1 for admission, from 6:30 AM to 6 PM every Saturday & Sunday you can find fun nick knacks to bring home for you and your loved ones.

Enjoy Chelsea Flea Market year-round (dependent if weather is not favorable).
